plot: Gazing Oozing with Mendacity surrealistically explores the way images force our eye to view them and the way the eye interprets.
title: Gazing Oozing with Mendacity
plot_es: Gazing Oozing with Mendacity surrealistically explores the way images force our eye to view them and the way the eye interprets.
plot_en: Gazing Oozing with Mendacity surrealistically explores the way images force our eye to view them and the way the eye interprets.
